mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure text and buttons are adequately spaced on smaller screens for better touch interactions.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and scripts to improve page load time, especially on mobile devices.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve on-page SEO by adding more relevant meta descriptions and alt texts for images.
userExperienceTip: Simplify the navigation menu for quicker access to key areas like booking and services.
tips: Consider adding a live chat feature for instant customer support.
Make the room selection and booking process more streamlined with fewer steps.
